name: koishi-plugin-ban-words
description: A Koishi content-filter plugin that reads a TXT dictionary file (one keyword per line), detects/blocks messages, and can recall offending messages.
author: xiaoxiao <you@example.com>

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --dts --format cjs --target node16 --external koishi --out-dir lib
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts --watch --dts --format cjs --target node16 --external koishi --out-dir lib
